page.title: 19A childs day - Leck area
page.content: I get up at about a quarter to eight and get some breakfast in the kitchen. Then I go and get dressed and sort out anything I need for school.My mum or dad drives me to school at about half past eight and I get to school at about quarter to nine. I usually play football outside or perhaps chess inside depending on the weather. We have assembly at nine o'clock until about half past nine and then we do maths. At 10.30 we have morning play- time for 15 minutes.Then we might have free writing which is writing stories. We have lunch from 12 noon until 1p.m. Then we have science or art or geog- raphy until 2.30 and then it's play- time for 15 minutes. Finally we have singing or drama or a story until 3.30 when it's home time. Then usually my mum picks me up and I go home and watch T.V..I go to bed at 9.30p.m..
